Manish Arora honoured by France

Ace designer Manish Arora has been awarded the ‘Knight of the Legion of Honour’, the highest French civilian distinction, for his contribution to the world of fashion.

The award, which was presented to Arora in a ceremony in New Delhi on Tuesday, also recognises his long standing ties with France.

“I’m thrilled and honoured by the recognition I have received from the country that I love with all my heart. France has been an inspiration always. I now live between Paris and Delhi and for me France is literally my own country. I hope to keep getting inspired by France, the beauty and elegance of the French people,” Arora said. — PTI
title: ENT-MANISH
